lead_paragraph: A former senator from Pennsylvania, Mr. Santorum was the runner-up in the 2012 Republican primary race, buoyed by the support of social conservatives, but has had little traction this time.

headline.print_headline: Santorum Announces New Presidential Bid, and New Focus on Middle Class
headline.main: Rick Santorum Announces New Presidential Bid, and New Focus on Middle Class

snippet: A former senator from Pennsylvania, Mr. Santorum was the runner-up in the 2012 Republican primary race, buoyed by the support of social conservatives, but has had little traction this time.
abstract: Rick Santorum announces bid for 2016 presidential nomination, his second following failed 2012 bid; Santorum, known for his appeal to social conservatives, has reworked his image in effort to court working class families.
